version_description:
Thank you for using “Offline Music Player”.

# Small bugs fixed.
# New features added.

Thank you for using "Offline Music Player"

- Now support flac format files.
- Google Drive and Dropbox support.
- UI update.
- More advanced media player.

Thank you for using "Offline Music Player"

- support flac format files from all sources.
- UI update.
- More advanced media player.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Offline Music Player features. This version includes the following changes:

1. UI Design improved.

2. New download manager introduced for better performance and reduce corrupted files count.

3. Several bugs fixed.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all the available Offline Music Player features. This version includes the following changes:

1. Date wise sorting added.

2. Send tracks to other devices from tracklists.

3. OneDrive issue fixed.

4. Download failed issue fixed.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all the available Offline Music Player features. This version includes the following changes:

1. Select button added on the playlist screen.
2. Multiple file transfer bug fixed.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all the available Offline Music Player features. This version includes the following changes:

1. iOS 14 support added.
2. Playlist manual order added.
3. Search option on album added.
4. Design updated.
